plot: Like the gargoyles on the block he guards, Themba is both a symbolic protector and a threat. He supplements his meager income with crime in order to support his younger brother, which leads to a devastating encounter.
title: Gargoyle
plot_es: Like the gargoyles on the block he guards, Themba is both a symbolic protector and a threat. He supplements his meager income with crime in order to support his younger brother, which leads to a devastating encounter.
